page.title: 18Health in the Maylands
page.content: A new{medical centre}in Maylandsea with doctor available mornings and 1 evening, lady doctor 2 mornings. Nurse always present. This practice has local accident and{emergency doctor who works closely with coastguard. Do own blood tests, smears, B.C.G. {Nearest casaulty hospital 25 miles away. Another doctor has surgery at Mayland every morning. Both dispense own drugs. Health services clinic is out of area but from there{community {domiciliary workers cover Mayland. Mainly serve the old, the children are checked at school.{No hospital}in area, maternity, geriatric and day psychiatric hospital 8 miles away, rest 25.{Most babies born in hospital with 48 hour release. Some born at home. Ante and post natal classes and family planning held at clinic. Doctors also deal with family planning
